home.about: The RoboCupJunior Competition Management System is designed for help the referees of RoboCupJunior Rescue Line / Maze.  In this system, it is very easy to do everything related to competition management, from course map creation to score calculation and ranking.  If you are a judge of a competition that adopts this system, please login from the button below. The competition OC knows the ID and password.  If you are a player, you can check the detailed results and ranking of the competition by choosing the competition you participated from the list below.
home.access_level: The you logged in account, {{account}}, does not have permission to access Competition Management.

service_home.about: The RCJ Scoring System was designed to assist the RoboCup Junior Rescue Line/Maze referees. The system makes it very easy to do everything involved in running a competition, from creating course maps to calculating and ranking scores. From this page, you can create a field map of your line/maze and download it as an image without having to log into the system. You can also generate world files for the Erebus platform(simulation).

scanner.description: Please scan the barcode / QR code on the score sheet

login.title: Staff Login
login.description: Please enter the username and password notified by the OC/TC and login.
login.failed: Sorry, your username or password cannot be recognized.
login.return: When login is successful, it returns to the you tried access page.

alert.sameName_mes: You must have a new name when you duplicate the signage pattern!

accessDenied.title: Access denied
accessDenied.description1: You do not have permission to access this page. Please login with authorized account.
accessDenied.description2: If you suspect this screen is displayed due to any problem, please contact system administrator.

shortURL404.title: Page Not Found
shortURL404.description1: The page corresponding to the specified short link was not found.
shortURL404.description2: The link's validity period may have passed.

registration.title: Registration
registration.description: This page is used to set whether or not teams can register themselves.
registration.errorMes: Authentication has failed. Please make sure that the expiration 　period has not passed and try again from the beginning.
registration.close: We are not accepting new registrations at this time. Please make sure that you are within the registration period.
registration.timelimit: This form must be completed within 30 minutes. If the time limit is exceeded, you will have to start again from the beginning.
registration.validation: Please make sure that all fields are filled in correctly.
registration.timeError: An error has occurred during registration. The time limit may have expired.
registration.consentMes: Please click on the button above to review the content of the Photograph, videotape, and documentation release form. By ticking the checkbox, you confirm that the parents of all your team members and you consent to the release form.
registration.allConsent: We have confirmed the agreement for all team members!
registration.registered: You have successfully registered your team! You will have received an email confirming your registration. It may contain instructions on how to access to your personal page.
registration.auth: Please enter your registration code and email address then click the submit button.
registration.authError: Either the registration code is wrong or the email address is invalid.
registration.authDesc1: An authentication email will be sent to the email address you specify here from the following address.
registration.authDesc2: Please make sure that you can receive e-mails from this address in advance. Please note that it has been reported that some e-mails cannot be successfully delivered to e-mail services provided by Microsoft, such as hotmail, or to addresses issued by some institutions, such as universities. Please avoid these e-mail addresses.
registration.authSent: An authentication email has been sent to you. Please follow the link in the email to continue the registration process. If you do not receive the email, please check your spam mail box. If you still can't find it, please try a different email address. Hotmail and some institutional email addresses have been reported to fail to deliver emails.

reservation.title: Booking
reservation.timeZone: All dates and times on this page are displayed in this time zone.
reservation.change: You can change your booking up to the deadline. If you wish to change your booking, you must first cancel this booking. To check the availability of the new appointment, please check on the 'Booking Status' bellow.
reservation.name: Name
reservation.myDescription: A short description to display on the personal pages
reservation.noResvDesc: There is no record of your booking.

js.cancelMes: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking? This action is irrevocable.
js.canceledMes: You have canceled your booking.  Please continue and make a new appointment.

survey.title: Questionnaire
survey.name: Name
survey.myDescription: A short description to display on the personal pages
survey.reSubmitDesc: Do you allow changes to be made to response once it has been submitted?
survey.multiple: You can modify your response as many times as you like up to this deadline.
survey.onlyOnce: This form can be submitted only once before this deadline. No changes can be made to the response after submission.
survey.readOnly: Displays the response in read-only mode.

js.multiple: Do you want to submit your response? You can revise your response after this submission until the deadline.
js.onlyOnce: This form can only be submitted once. It is not possible to modify the response after this submission.

cabinet.title: Cabinets
cabinet.description: You can distribute various materials to your team.
cabinet.description2: This page will contain the files distributed by the organisers.
cabinet.empty: It seems that no files have been stored yet...

js.delConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this file? This operation cannot be undone.

mypage.document: Submit your documentation and other files.
mypage.cabinet: Contain the files distributed by the organisers.

interview.howtoread: How to read the team name
interview.nameread: Please enter the name of the team member and how to read 【One person per line】
interview.role: Please tell me the role each member played in the team in detail

js.go_judge: Are you sure to move Judge Page?
js.no_judge: The run you selected was already ended! If you need to edit, please contact OC.

view.comment_e: If you have any comments about the run, please write in the box below.
view.sign_e: By wiritng a sign below, you accept that the record are correct. Your team also further undertakes to not appeal the score at a later stage.
view.m_score_d: Please tap the tile of the direction the team scored.

judge.before: Before the start of the run record, please confirm that the following information is correct.
judge.tap_red: After confirming that each item is correct, please tap the red part.
judge.ready: We are ready to start run recording!!
judge.push_start: Please push the 【Run Record Start】 button.
judge.tap_tile: Please tap the checkpoint tile selected by the team on the course map on the right.
judge.push_timer: Please press the 【Timer Start】 button according to the referee!
judge.show_up: Team did show up for start within their time:
judge.confirm_text: Please press the red button and go to the score / time confirmation screen.
judge.disabled_confirm_text: Please stop the timer before you get to the score / time confirmation screen.
judge.networkErrorDescription: Failed to save the scoring-run data on the server. Check the network connection.  The record of scoring run can be continued as it is, but it is not stored in the server.  Please call system manager ASAP!
judge.rescuedVictimsMes: To delete a rescued victim, double click or swipe left (Mobile Device)
judge.noShow: Start timer when team no show

js.score_element: Place checkpoint markers on tiles without scoring elements (rule 3.3.5)
js.cantvisit: Cannot place checkpoint markers on tile that robot can't visit.
js.start: Not allowed to place checkpoint markers on start tile (rule 3.3.6)

lops.title: LoPs Count ＞ 3
lops.content: The team *may* move to next checkpoint tile now.

js.not_yet: All checkpoints are not yet placed.
js.implicit: You may have forgot to clear implicit checkpoint

sign.no_sign: Please write it before submit run data.
sign.confirm: If you click 'YES', the run data will record.  After that you cannot change the run.

backup.title: Back up
backup.description: Back up this competition to a file. The backup file contains the following information.
backup.item7: Document form settings, response and submission data
backup.item10: Reservation master setting and reservation information

js.complete: Your backup job is now complete. You can download it from the list below.

restore.title: Restore the competition
restore.description: On this page, you can restore the competition from the file. You need a backup file of the name ending with '.cms'. If the version of the system you backed up is different, the process may not complete successfully.

js.complete: Restoration of the competition has been completed.

form.editDeadline: You can edit this form as many times as you wish until the submission deadline above.
form.overwrite: A file has already been uploaded. When you upload a new file, it will overwrite the old one. Please make sure that the uploaded file is not corrupted.

form.mp4: The format of the uploaded file should be mp4. If your file is in another format such as (.mov / .wmv / etc...), please convert it to mp4 format on your computer before uploading.
form.maxLength: You can enter no more than following characters:
form.lengthLimit: This form has a character limit. If you enter more than the specified number of characters, you will not be able to save the form.
form.lengthLimitExceed: You have exceeded the character limit.

review.deleteType: Please select the type of deletion.
